question_content.description:
### Problem07
Which statements that characterize the doubling hypothesis? Mark all that apply.

**Choices:**

a. A way to avoid mathematical analysis of program performance

b. A way to avoid empirical tests of program performance

c. A way to determine the order of growth of the running time of a program

d. A way to better understand the performance of a program

e. A way to improve the performance of a program
question_content.author: Yantao Mei
choices: a. A way to avoid mathematical analysis of program performance
b. A way to avoid empirical tests of program performance
c. A way to determine the order of growth of the running time of a program
d. A way to better understand the performance of a program
e. A way to improve the performance of a program
